description:
Tired of being called "shrimp," Chip gains more than height when he straps on some sinister robotic armor. It magnifies his anger and changes him into the Chipinator, a cyborg who needs to be cut back down to size- a tall order indeed, even for Cubix!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Combock, Takuminator no Bousou o Yamero!
コンボック, タクミネーターの暴走を止めろ!
